name: Line-up
description:
For each round you are given three suspects in a line-up and you have to decide which one committed the crime using clues and evidence that are provided to you. Click on individual suspects to get more information on each of them and check the case file to find out details about the murders...

Tools:

  • Unity 2.2.2 (C#)
  • Visual Studio
  • Photoshop Elements 2020
